figure_1.title: Figure 1.
figure_1.caption: Flow chart describing the number of publications retrieved and subsequent selection applying the search and the exclusion criteria detailed in Section 2.1.1

claims.sentence: The numbers of initially retrieved hits and of publication excluded in the phases described in Section 2.1.1 is described in Figure 1.

Derivation of health‐based guidance values
The selected BMDL–BMDU intervals (in mg/kg bw per day) for the identified renal and fertility effects of 3‐MCPD are shown in Figure 2.
The numbers of initially retrieved hits and of publication excluded in the phases described in Section 2.1.1 is described in Figure 1.
